term.title: blank indication

item.text: Indication obtained from a sample of blank material under the measurement conditions for the measurand.

notes.item: In VIM 4.2, "background indication" is given as an alternate term for "blank indication". However, in analytical chemistry these terms refer to different concepts.

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1001 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
